infos.value: ...Phew, I'm beat. Not that it comes as much of a surprise.
Wow, this is curious.
...Wh-what is?
What, just because Sosha said she's tired and I didn't?
Not that. It just struck me that you really are doing your best.
He's right about that.
To think that we're right back on the road to Leonis just when we thought we'd have a chance to rest in Wezette.
I thought you would have at least whined about it once by now.
But this is the first time we've ever worked together with «Caelum», you know?
...Huh. So your sense of rivalry is keeping you going?
It's only natural! We are representing «Fortem», after all.
Well, our numbers are also terribly low at the moment.
Speaking of which, I have not laid eyes on Etre and the other new recruits in some time. I wonder what's happened...
From what I've heard...their morale plummeted after Lilyth berated them.
So what has happened to Etre? She hasn't...gone on the run, has she?
Unfortunately, it seems that she's become somewhat of a recluse. Yerma is always by her side, so that is some comfort. But alas...
Was there not one more? Umm...what was her name again?
The one that touted herself as the strongest paladin, right?
Right, her! I think her name was Nasha.
Hmmm. I thought they were really giving it their all.
I heard that they got the boots knocked off of them by Lilyth during a «Fortem» mock battle.
But why would that old hag even be there? She's not in «Fortem».
Because she likes to be seen wherever she can, that one...
All she does is nag! It's no wonder men don't want anything to do with her!
Just who might we be talking about now...?
I only did as I was requested by Lord Sterne, mind you.
Were you not aware?
...Apologies.
This lecture is postponed. Prepare for battle!
